content: lamar valley headband project photos to determine sizing measure the circumference of your head along the path that you would like the headband to fit i wanted it to fit at an angle as shown in the photo so i measured from the top of my forehead and over my ears a good rule of thumb is to knit a finished project approximately 2 smaller than the diameter of your head for a proper comfortable fit the finished project measures 19 5 which fits most adults adjust needle size as needed materials yarn aran weight ● approximately 30 yd or 18 g of drops big merino color forest green ● approximately 30 yd or 18g of drops big merino color off-white needles ● us 9 4 0 mm 24 in circular needle ● us 10 5 0 mm 24 in circular needle miscellaneous ● stitch markers project notes ● tapestry needle to weave in ends gauge the lamar valley also dubbed the american serengeti is located within yellowstone national park this area is 4 x 4 / 10 x 10 cm = 17 sts x 22 row home to vast diversity of animal species including bison grey wolves grizzly bears pronghorn and elk among many more this headband aims to capture the majesty of standing in lamar valley featuring the iconic grizzly bear elk and bison this pattern is available on ravelry by alyssa kaat designs and etsy from alyssakaatart additional distribution of this pattern is prohibited pg 1 pattern this pattern is worked in the round use the long tail cast on to create 97 stitches slip the last stitch over the first or a total of 96 this will create a seamless cast on in the round place a beginning of round stitch marker row 1 * k1 p1 repeat from * to end of row row 2 * k1 cc p1 mc repeat from * to end of row row 3 repeat row 1 row 4-19 knit each row starting with chart a then b then c i found it helpful to add a stitch marker every 10 stitches row 19-22 repeat ribbing as described in row 1-3 bind off and style charts chart overview this pattern is available on ravelry by alyssa kaat designs and etsy from alyssakaatart additional distribution of this pattern is prohibited pg 2 chart a chart b this pattern is available on ravelry by alyssa kaat designs and etsy from alyssakaatart additional distribution of this pattern is prohibited pg 3 chart c this pattern is available on ravelry by alyssa kaat designs and etsy from alyssakaatart additional distribution of this pattern is prohibited pg 4
